columns.Candidate_ID: The unique identifier for each candidate.
columns.People_ID: The identifier linking to the corresponding person.
columns.Poll_Source: The source of the poll data.
columns.Date: The date range when the poll was conducted.
columns.Support_rate: The percentage of support for the candidate.
columns.Consider_rate: The percentage of people considering the candidate.
columns.Oppose_rate: The percentage of opposition against the candidate.
columns.Unsure_rate: The percentage of respondents unsure about the candidate.

candidate.table_description: The table tracks polling data and candidate support metrics.

columns.People_ID: The unique identifier for each person.
columns.Sex: The gender of the person, represented by a single character.
columns.Name: The full name of the person.
columns.Date_of_Birth: The birth date of the person in a standard format.
columns.Height: The height of the person measured in centimeters.
columns.Weight: The weight of the person measured in kilograms.

people.table_description: The table contains personal details of individuals.
